client.gui.ceo

Class ReportViewController

  • java.lang.Object
    • client.gui.ceo.ReportViewController

  • public class ReportViewController
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is the GUI class of report view form. This class will allow to the CEO to watch about all reports were created by station manager and marketing manager
    Version:
    final
    Author:
    Or Haim

      • getStationsReports

        public void getStationsReports()
        This function sends a request to the server to get from database report of station manager by report type, station id and report creation date.

      • setReport

        public void setReport(com.google.gson.JsonObject response)
        This function prepares all the required data for the report that came from the database to view the report.
        Parameters:
        response - - contains all data of the report that came from database

      • setColumns

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> setColumns(com.google.gson.JsonArray jsonColumns)
        This function that creates an arrayList that will contain all the relevant columns of the report.
        Parameters:
        jsonColumns - - JsonArray containing the columns of the report.
        Returns:
        - arrayList that contains the required columns.

      • setRows

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String>> setRows(java.lang.String reportType,
                                                                          com.google.gson.JsonArray jsonRows)
        Function that creates an arrayList containing all the relevant data by report type. Puts the data(parameter "jsonRows") into rows to display in the table.
        Parameters:
        reportType -
        jsonRows - - the type of report that is required to display the data about him.
        Returns:
        - arrayList of rows that contains the required data.

      • fillTable

        public void fillTable(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> columns,
                      java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String>> rows)
        This function fills all the data of report in the display table.
        Parameters:
        columns - - contains list of the columns names.
        rows - - contains list of rows(report data).

      • checkInput

        public boolean checkInput()
        This function checks whether all the information needed to display the report has been entered by the user.
        Returns:
        - boolean response, true - if all fields are filled correctly, false - if something wrong.

      • setOptionOfReportsType

        public void setOptionOfReportsType()
        This function initializes all choice options to the choice box by type of report for all reports. In addition, is responsible for loading the stations ID and creation dates of existing reports in a database into a choice boxes by the report type. This is done by a listener that when the user changes the report type it loads the choice options.

      • getStationIDByReportType

        public com.google.gson.JsonArray getStationIDByReportType(com.google.gson.JsonObject request)
        This function sends a request to a server that requests all stations ID by report type.
        Parameters:
        request - - contains the type of report for which the request is being made.
        Returns:

      • load

        public void load(javafx.scene.layout.Pane paneChange)
        Function responsible to get the 'fxml' file and call to the function that init the UI.
        Parameters:
        paneChange - - this is the value that responsible to change the panes by the correct button.
